Create an adminLTE toast

Source: R/feedbacks.R
toast.Rd

Builtin AdminLTE3 toasts

Usage

toast(
  title,
  body = NULL,
  subtitle = NULL,
  options = NULL,
  session = shiny::getDefaultReactiveDomain()
)

Arguments

title

Toast title.

body

Body content.

subtitle

Toast subtitle.

options

Toasts options: a list. See https://adminlte.io/docs/3.0/javascript/toasts.html.

session

Shiny session object.

Examples

if (interactive()) {
  library(shiny)
  library(bs4Dash)

  shinyApp(
    ui = dashboardPage(
      header = dashboardHeader(),
      sidebar = dashboardSidebar(),
      body = dashboardBody(
        actionButton("sendToast", "Send Toast")
      ),
      controlbar = dashboardControlbar(),
      title = "Toasts"
    ),
    server = function(input, output) {
      observeEvent(input$sendToast, {
        toast(
          title = "My Toast",
          body = h4("I am a toast!"),
          options = list(
            autohide = TRUE,
            icon = "fas fa-home",
            close = FALSE
          )
        )
      })
    }
  )
}
